newsitem.title: USA: Allied Capital names Walton chairman, CEO.
newsitem.headline: Allied Capital names Walton chairman, CEO.

text.p: Allied Capital Corp said it named Bill Walton as chairman and chief executive to replace David Gladstone, who stepped down from the two positions on February 1.
Walton previously served as managing director of New York-based Butler Capital Corp.
Walton was also named chairman and chief executive of Allied's investment advisor, Allied Capital Advisors Inc.
